questions.title: Algebra Equation
questions.content: What is the value of x in the equation 2x + 5 = 13?
questions.explanation: Subtract 5 from both sides: 2x = 8. Then divide by 2: x = 4.

questions.title: Triangle Classification
questions.content: If a triangle has angles measuring 30°, 60°, and 90°, what type of triangle is it?
questions.explanation: A triangle with a 90° angle is a right triangle.

questions.title: Quadratic Formula
questions.content: Which of the following is the correct form of the quadratic formula?
questions.explanation: The quadratic formula is x = (-b ± √(b² - 4ac)) / 2a for the equation ax² + bx + c = 0.
